original_text: Hezekiah was happy to meet the officers who came from the king of Babylon. Hezekiah showed them the places where he stored his valuable things. He showed them all his silver and gold things, his spices and very valuable olive oil. He also showed them all his weapons. Hezekiah showed them all his valuable things. There was nothing in his palace or in his whole kingdom that he did not show to the king of Babylon's officers.
korean_text: 히스기야가 사자들로 말미암아 기뻐하여 그들에게 보물 창고 곧 은금과 향료와 보배로운 기름과 모든 무기고에 있는 것을 다 보여 주었으니 히스기야가 궁중의 소유와 전 국내의 소유를 보이지 아니한 것이 없는지라

sentences.original_text: Hezekiah was happy to meet the officers
who came from the king of Babylon
where he stored his valuable things
sentences.korean_translation: 그곳은 그가 귀중한 것들을 저장하는 곳이었습니다

sentences.original_text: He showed them all his silver and gold things
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 그에게 자신의 모든 은과 금 물건들을 보여주었습니다

sentences.original_text: his spices and very valuable olive oil
sentences.korean_translation: 자신의 향료와 매우 가치 있는 감람 기름도 보여주었습니다

sentences.original_text: He also showed them all his weapons
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 또한 그에게 자신의 모든 무기들도 보여주었습니다

sentences.original_text: Hezekiah showed them all his valuable things
sentences.korean_translation: 히스기야는 그에게 자신의 모든 귀중한 것들을 보여주었습니다

sentences.original_text: There was nothing in his palace
that he did not show to the king of Babylon's officers
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 바벨론 왕의 관원들에게 보여주지 않은 것이
